role_definition: Evaluate the coverage and relative performance of different channels with respect to the blend of service and product activity. Optimize channel use to minimize costs and enhance customer experience
example_of_use: Product designers review the performance of products over different channels and channel combinations to refine product designs and delivery
executive_summary: Evaluate the coverage and relative performance of different channels with respect to the blend of service and product activity. Optimize channel use to minimize costs and enhance customer experience
key_features: Customer experience enhancement through channel optimization
